description:
A winterized version of the popular Ryder 5-panel hat in soft fleece and quick-drying nylon brim. This winter 5-panel is a great ski touring or snowshoeing hat as it keeps you warm without overheating. The brim is soft enough to be folded or crushed but still firm enough to pop back into shape when it is time to go back on your head.

  • Soft fleece front and back panels, nylon brim
  • Moldable foam brim
  • Adjustable webbing back closure
  • Made in Canada
name: Ambler Ryder Fleece Hat - Unisex
